p: A matrix of pharmacological interactions between limonene (the most selective terpene) and the other major EO terpenes was created for the three cyclic forms of T. cruzi, using the fixed-ratio isobologram method, as described previously by Fivelman et al. [ 34] with some modifications (TableÂ 1). In the interaction matrix, the estimated IC 50 for each terpene was used as fixed-value for the combinations. In addition, a mixture of limonene and BNZ was also evaluated.
